reviews.text: We are grateful and happy that the group Historical Voices chose Rydals Manor for their investigation. They stayed with us for a couple of days to sense whether there was any truth to the strong feelings of presence that people have spoken about for over 150 years. Historical Voices later invited us to be part of their findings and experience it for ourselves. It was an incredible and enriching evening — respectful and informative — and we are truly fascinated by their work and grateful to have been a part of it.
reviews.name: Sara Söderberg

reviews.text: I had the privilege of joining Historical Voices during an investigation at the Haunted Museum and was impressed by their thoroughness and, above all, their respect for what we cannot see or touch. I can wholeheartedly recommend Historical Voices for future investigations.
reviews.name: Jan Barck

reviews.text: The investigation conducted by Historical Voices was a fascinating experience. Their work is characterized by deep respect for the past and a strong sense of responsibility. They left the sites exactly as they found them.
reviews.name: Victor Conrad
